Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":643890,"totalDownVotes":48735,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":25260,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1207311,"totalDownVotes":130626,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":87530,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":543722,"totalDownVotes":38147,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":12700,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3824895,"totalDownVotes":315545,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":21358,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":915212,"totalDownVotes":119137,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🍀SUPER LUCK🍀] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":6653,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Super Luck Event!

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2820459,"totalDownVotes":368363,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":9590,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":319328,"totalDownVotes":33196,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":6032,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW STAND UPDATE』 🏹✨

Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":7284047,"creatorName":"Wrongful Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":29928,"totalDownVotes":6596,"universeId":2411591707,"name":"[5X STATS] A Hero's Destiny","placeId":6461766546,"playerCount":5587,"imageToken":"T_6461766546_8638","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Train with friends, battle difficult enemies, and complete challenging quests while working your way towards becoming the strongest! 

Changelog
- New code system
- New x2 XP/Yen/Strength boosts
- Added a confirmation for spinning when you have a legendary class
- Rebirths now increase spin luck 
- Added a buy all spins button
- Added another tyrone dummy npc to test critical damage
- Added 3 songs
- Scanner gamepass now abbreviates stats 

Controls
Z - Train
X - Lockon
N - Equip Sword (Ninja)
Q/E/R/F/C - Abilities
G - Awakening
CTRL - Sprint"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3259814,"totalDownVotes":287320,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":9834,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":7010,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here!

⚽️ New Soccer Ball reward: Bonded Wheels!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":709503,"totalDownVotes":95417,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 💧 [WATER & BANNERS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":4782,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":156560,"totalDownVotes":8390,"universeId":648454481,"name":"🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":3070,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":3732983,"creatorName":"polandgamebuilders","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":71145,"totalDownVotes":13963,"universeId":943733974,"name":"🎉 Week II 🎉   Bitcoin Miner [Beta]","placeId":2629642516,"playerCount":2818,"imageToken":"T_2629642516_7060","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Bitcoin Miner, in this game you can mine bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, upgrade new cards, buy new mining devices and many other.


🚧Game still under construction so expect new Updates soon.

- ❗ Quest Sytem Rework!
- 💱 Exchanger revamp!



📕update log 📕
- 🎉 Bit Event 2!
- 🖥️ New Change Card Ui!
- 🌿 New Decorations
- Unloading plots
- Fast Card Placement
- 🔊 Some Sound effects!
- ⚙️ Bug Fixes!


⚠️Note: This is just a simulation, all cryptocurrencies are ONLY in-game items, NOT connected to real world ones

⬇️ Check Social links for new Update info

Ps. Sorry but we won't add Dogecoin to this game. We always try to do what players want but adding Dogecoin is impossible for many reasons."},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":241857,"totalDownVotes":21494,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":7551,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":28603491,"creatorName":"SushiWalrus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":558514,"totalDownVotes":57516,"universeId":380704901,"name":"[Zone Control! (KoTH)] Ro-Ghoul [ALPHA]","placeId":914010731,"playerCount":2313,"imageToken":"T_914010731_9b0a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you everyone for supporting me and my game (:

SHUTDOWN = UPDATE
Check out the social links down below the description! And follow the game while you're at it c:

Controls:
1-9 = Activate/Deactivate your weapon.
X = Toggle sprint.
Q = Punch/Kick, gives a single experience point.
T = Block, duration increases based on Durability.
M = Equip/Unequip Mask
Click = Attack
E = Special 1
R = Special 2
F = Special 3
C = Bonus Special
0 = Arata (CCG Team)
G = Kakuhou Special/Quinx
Double tap (W/A/S/D) to evade.

Do not trust any other 'Ro-Ghoul' copies on roblox! Those games may threaten your account! Be safe out there (:

Still in heavy development.

Please do not try to ruin the game for other players as we have our own moderation system and may temporarily ban you or in worse cases, permanently.

Accessories aside from hair gets removed."},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":461935,"totalDownVotes":44789,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[FL] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":4173,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

[CREDIT TO THE ORIGINAL FNF GAME]

https://devforum.roblox.com/t/ff-credits-and-information

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":6116651,"creatorName":"Crafty Savage!","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":40559,"totalDownVotes":3608,"universeId":1700723639,"name":"[👑10MIL EVENT!] Combat Rift","placeId":4952780297,"playerCount":3245,"imageToken":"T_4952780297_c4c8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Combat Rift! 

👑10M EVENT!
✨2X GLOBAL XP BOOST(ENTIRE EVENT)
🥚10M Secret Eggs hidden across all maps, can you find all the pets? (Each egg rewards a different/better pet)
🐾6 New 10M Pets found in 10M secret eggs!
🔮7 HIDDEN CODES across all maps!
🐛 Bug Fixes(Fixed Dual Wield(x2 Damage))
😨 SOMETHING COMING SOON(???)

The event will end in the next update!

How to Play:
👹 Battle monsters!
💎 Discover Rare Swords!
💰 Sell skulls to get coins from the chest!
☠️ Reach Max level!
🥇 Climb The Leaderboards!
👑 Discover New Worlds!
🐾 Hatch Pets with gems from Killing Monsters!

⭐ Favorite, Follow, and Like the game to show support! ⭐
Use Codes: "NinjaCaves"

⚜️ Join the Group: "Crafty Savage" for Group chest and Tag! ⚜️
🐦 Follow @LordWasteds on Twitter for news! 🐦
🔔 Hit the follow button to be notified of updates first! 🔔
Thank you! 
(SHUTDOWN = UPDATE/FIXES)"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2175093,"totalDownVotes":667368,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":11169,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":280818,"totalDownVotes":146454,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":2936,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":3642592,"creatorName":"Schwifty Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1288785,"totalDownVotes":277570,"universeId":498490399,"name":"Mad City","placeId":1224212277,"playerCount":2497,"imageToken":"T_1224212277_2d87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The boss and gift event has ended! Congratulations to the people who won the rewards!

Welcome to Mad City, where the choice is yours to choose the power of good or evil. Cause chaos in the city streets as a criminal and super villain or join the super heroes and police force to bring justice to the city. With so many heists, the chaos never stops!

Follow the developers on twitter for updates and special codes:
Lead Developer: @Taymastar 
Lead Programmer: @ChiefDaysRBLX @osedaycan
World Builder: @FamedChris & @TheGemini_II
3D Modeler: @Nic10Telf
Official Twitter: @SchwiftyStudios

LAST UPDATE:
🦌Boss Battle
🎁Gift Rewards
❄️Winter Map
☃️More!

Welcome to Southwest Florida! Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
